name: Goo Share This
author: Aleksandar Milivojevic

sections.description:
Allow site visitors to share your blog posts or pages via favorite social networks, attracting more visitors to your site. Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and many more included.

Several different styling and hover effects implemented for easier in-site outlook integration.

Insert anywhere in the post via shortcode, or, include in every post/page (at beginning and/or bottom) automatically (convenient way for large wordpress installations with many entries, with ability to exclude from particular post/pages).

Adventages

  • Lightweight – short code, plugin is doing exactly what is meant for
  • Fast – no extensive use of processing time
  • Device friendly – it will look handsome on PC, mobile or tablet
  • Browser friendly – Chrome, Firefox, Safari and IE tested
  • Theme friendly – tested on various WordPress themes (but we strongly recommend you to test the plugin in your own theme)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download Goo Share This
  2. Upload the Goo Share Thisdirectory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, file manager etc.), and decompress it.
  3. Activate Goo Share This from your Plugins page
  4. Access plugin settings from admin panel > Goo Tools Plugins > Goo Share This
  5. In post/page editor insert shortcode [goo-share-this] anywhere in text (as a separate paragraph) where you want to display social buttons. If your article uses <!--nextpage--> (page break tag), insert shortcode right before or after page breaks.
